name: Unity Pokémon-like Framework
description:
This is a framework for a custom Pokémon-like game i am developing in unity.

FOR TESTING PURPOSES I AM USING POKÉMON ASSETS, WHEN THIS FRAMEWORK WILL BE RELEASED IT WON'T INCLUDE THE ASSETS.

The framework is far from done, so for now i will keep it private, once it'll reach a deliverable stage i will make the code accessible to anyone, giving you the means to make your own version! Consider donating if you can as this takes lots of time to develop ;) <3

In this demo you are able to choose your team across 12 different monsters, each monster has it's official statistics but as of for now, the moves are randomly assigned.

I made a system that enables you to assemble a move by disassembling it into "blocks", stacking more blocks gives more effects, such as damage, status, recoil, heal and etc.. giving you the ability to create custom ones.

CLICK ME TO TAKE A LOOK




These are 2 moves assembled with blocks, each is customizable and serialized inside unity, giving you the flexibility and ease of use.

In the end i would like to be able to recreate it entirely, but it's still a long way to come. I am also working on the over-wold and the ability to have monsters encounters so stay tuned for other updates!

As of for now this demo features:

  1. Team choice
  2. Standard battle, along with moves, statuses and the ability to swap monsters
  3. 18 Official moves, with all their effects
  4. 12 monsters
  5. Camera system and dedicated particle system
  6. Official stats, along with the ability to increase or decrease the stats in game.

The next steps will include:

  • Adding other missing move blocks
  • Bag and Items
  • A custom editor to edit a monster
  • Simple over-world (for starters)
  • Encounters

I will update this as much as i can, so please stay tuned!
